title: Genesis First Look
description:
The Genesis is our top of the line cruiser board, with added features for freestyle performance.

The Genesis is a drop-through board, bringing you closer to the ground for ease of pushing and sliding. The fiberglass reinforced flex provides a solid ride on a wider and more functional platform that gives you enough room to walk tail to nose and back again. New concave for 2013 means more lock in, and angled kick-tails with the width to nail any trick you want.

The Genesis comes in at 38 or 44 inches. Choose a size to suit your style.
Rider: Will Clay

Genesis 38- L: 38.00" W: 9.25" WB 26.00"
Genesis 44: L: 38.00" W: 9.60" WB: 32.00"

The 2013 Backlash features a Hawaiian Koa topsheet.
